betterquesting:10.desc:8:
I am not the only one that is seeking more furnaces!
The fiends I have been fighting were all like me, drawn by the awesomeness of furnaces!
This awesomeness, though, comes with a price, and a heavy one, for those who are not worthy of handling it. The furnaces can take control over you, and turn you into a mindless husk, enslaved to their will, whatever that may be.
Power and greatness being a source of corruption I understand, and I can definitely say I felt it (who wouldn't?!?); what I do not understand, is how does one escape this call?
Power from other sources seems to be pointless; the Hellfire being I just faces has a might like no other I have seen, and yet it seemed like nothing in comparison to the call of the furnace dimension. 
I am definitely facing something I am not ready to best, I think it will be good to leave the furnace dimension be until I can understand what is going on...
